name: you can (or can't) make it
description:
this is just a platformer. you play as a ball and you have to get to the end goal. i am doing this to help me motivate me to make the game and get feedback from you. donations would be very much appreciated since it will allow me to have better software and make better games in the future

controls:

movement:wasd or arrow keys

jump is space and there is double jump

restart is R

amd pause is escape

thankyou if you downloaded my game
